availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Davis (Hickman and Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer and gentleman.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer and gentleman. South Carolina native. Married to Mary Davis. Father of Daniel Davis, Elizabeth Davis, David Davis, E. Davis, Benjamin Davis, and Charles H. Davis. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Gentleman in Ballard County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 22A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 606.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 43B.
